name: .BBSCENE File Extension
summary: Learn about .BBSCENE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A BBSCENE file is a 3D scene created by the Blockbench 3D model editor with the Preview Scene Customiser plugin installed. It contains information about a 3D scene, including the position, size, and faces of cubes (in plain text), and may include one or more .TGA or .PNG textures. Blockbench users with the Preview Scene Customiser plugin installed typically save scenes as BBSCENE files when creating and modifying scenes for video games.

content: Blockbench is an open-source app for creating 3D models, texturing them, and animating them. You can also install plugins to the program to extend its capabilities.
For example, you can install plugins by selecting File → Plugins. If you install the Preview Scene Customizer plugin, you can create, edit, manage, export, and download BBSCENE preview scenes.

instructions: You can open BBSCENE files with Blockbench (multiplatform) with the Preview Scene Customizer plugin installed. For example, to open a BBSCENE file, select File → Open Model.
